after 1400 hrs of this game i have enjoyed pretty much all of it, most friends i play with i still do as they are very good, nice, kind people. The only thing i hate is the anti cheat and report system as i got reported for having a good game and got a bad trust factor because the reports but after 5 months break to faceit i returned to MM as MGE and destroy i guess faceit is a way higher level to mm but nothing compares to matchmaking as the servers are the best, all third party websites give bad var which gives bad FPS and the players now as reasonably good and not that toxic as my trust factor has returned to a good state. in all thank you valve for all these memories and friends and highly recommend this game to everyone
